thread.title: JPMorgan Taps Carnegie Mellon Professor for New Artificial Intelligence Role

author: Emily Glazer
title: JPMorgan Taps Carnegie Mellon Professor for New Artificial Intelligence Role

organizations.name: jpmorgan taps carnegie mellon professor for new artificial intelligence role jpmorgan chase & co.

text:
JPMorgan Chase & Co. is investing further in artificial intelligence.
The largest U.S. bank by assets said Thursday that Carnegie Mellon Universityâ€™s head of machine learning will join JPMorgan in a new role, head of artificial-intelligence research.
In the position, Manuela Veloso, who is also a professor at Carnegie Mellon, will build...
